name: Chili Dip
author: Judy H
summary: I've had this recipe for a long time. It's great for parties and football get-togethers. With just three ingredients, it's very easy to prepare. Serve it hot with your favorite corn chips.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained
directions: In a medium, microwave safe bowl, mix cream cheese, chili without beans and diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
Microwave cream cheese mixture on high 1 minute
Remove from microwave, stir and repeat until the mixture is hot and thoroughly blended
